content.body: annevk: ping on re-review for https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/6869 ?
Domenic: so to make sure I understand correctly, the remaining Window-object reuse question is about a subsequent navigation of this about:blank document, right?
content.formatted_body: Domenic: so to make sure I understand correctly, the remaining Window-object reuse question is about a subsequent navigation of this about:blank document, right?

content.body: Anyway, approved modulo that assumption and an optional nit
annevk: yes, because you can't observe the Window before this initial pseudo-load, so you can't tell whether it was reused or not.
content.formatted_body: annevk: yes, because you can't observe the Window before this initial pseudo-load, so you can't tell whether it was reused or not.
